keyword: how many calories in a kit kat
title: How Many Calories in a Kit Kat?
meta_description: Discover how many calories in a kit kat bar, including carbs, fat, protein, full nutrition breakdown, and variations for better choices.
h1: How Many Calories in a Kit Kat?
assumptions: Standard 4-finger Kit Kat bar (~45 g), milk chocolate coated wafer, no custom fillings or toppings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, flavor, and regional recipe. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard Kit Kat bar contains about 215 calories with 26 g carbs and 3 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in a standard Kit Kat bar?
What are the carbs in a Kit Kat?
faqs.a: About 26 g total carbs, including 21 g sugars and 1 g fiber per bar.

faqs.q: Is Kit Kat high in fat?
faqs.a: Yes, 11 g total fat per bar, with 6 g saturated fat.

faqs.q: How much protein in a Kit Kat?
faqs.a: Roughly 3 g protein per standard bar.

faqs.q: Do Kit Kats have trans fats?
faqs.a: Typically 0 g trans fat in standard Kit Kat bars.
